perturbation.original_text: LBIO shall pay all undisputed invoices within thirty (30) days of receipt of such invoice.
perturbation.changed_text: LBIO shall pay all undisputed invoices within sixty (60) days of receipt of such invoice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by extending the payment deadline from 30 to 60 days. This creates ambiguity and could lead to disputes over when late fees or other penalties apply.

perturbation.original_text: MD Anderson shall return to LBIO all of its Confidential Information and all Materials or, at LBIO's option, destroy or completely delete such Confidential Information and Materials, at LBIO's option.
perturbation.changed_text: MD Anderson shall return to LBIO some of its Confidential Information and some of Materials or, at LBIO's option, destroy or completely delete such Confidential Information and Materials, at MD Anderson's sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction about the return of all confidential information. The clause now suggests that MD Anderson can choose to withhold some confidential information or materials, while still allowing LBIO to choose between return and destruction, but limits the range of materials to which that choice applies. It further conflicts with the earlier section defining Confidential Information and obligations of non-disclosure.

perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement commences on the Effective Date and shall continue in effect until the later of (a) the fourth (4th) anniversary of the Effective Date, or (b) the completion or termination of the Research and receipt by LBIO of all deliverables due from MD Anderson hereunder, unless sooner terminated in accordance with the provisions of Section 2.2 or Section 9.14.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement commences on the Effective Date and shall continue in effect until the earlier of (a) the fourth (4th) anniversary of the Effective Date, or (b) the completion or termination of the Research and receipt by LBIO of all deliverables due from MD Anderson hereunder, unless sooner terminated in accordance with the provisions of Section 2.2 or Section 9.14.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by changing 'the later of' to 'the earlier of'. This dramatically alters the duration of the agreement, creating a direct conflict and ambiguity regarding the contract's lifespan.
